arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Genoa: Serie A Returns to Action
arts.sum: Fabio Pisacane and Daniele De Rossi faced each other twice as players: two wins for the current Genoa coach in Roma–Cagliari, both 1–0 victories in Serie A 2016/17 and 2017/18. In Sardinia, the head-to-head record between the two teams stands at 40 matches: 22 home wins for Cagliari (the most recent a 2–1 victory in Serie A 2023/24), 10 draws (the last a 1–1 in Serie A last season) and 8 Genoa wins (the most recent a 3–2 success in Serie A 2021/22).
Two of Serie A’s top three lock horns at San Siro this weekend and Alex Wrigley has correct score picks for all 10 games in the Italian top flight.

arts.ttl: Cagliari vs. Genoa - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Serie A clash between Cagliari and Genoa, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
